kuyenda: Mphamvu yokwera pa chinthu chomizidwa mumadzimadzi
inertia: Mchitidwe wa chinthu kukana kusintha koyenda
mphamvu yokoka: Mphamvu yomwe imakopa zinthu zolemera kwa wina ndi mzake
kulemera: Mphamvu yogwiritsidwa ntchito pa chinthu chifukwa cha mphamvu yokoka
ntchito: Kusamutsa mphamvu pamene mphamvu ikugwira ntchito ndikusuntha chinthu
Kinetic mphamvu: Mphamvu ya chinthu chifukwa cha kuyenda kwake
mphamvu zothekera: Mphamvu zosungidwa chifukwa cha malo kapena masinthidwe a chinthu
kukangana: Mphamvu yomwe imatsutsa kuyenda pakati pa malo awiri okhudzana
mpweya: Gulu la mpweya wozungulira Dziko Lapansi
phokoso: Mphamvu yamagetsi yomwe imayenda ngati mafunde kudzera mu sing'anga
